data_table.description: LES (Life Experiences Survey) - The dataset provides data of variables that queried for the occurrence of life experiences like a detention, death of a family member, marriage, pregnancy, etc., their frequency and impact on participants' life.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: LES_MARRIAGETIME
variable.description: 1. Time Period for: Marriage
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_DETENTIONTIME
variable.description: 2. Time Period for: Detention in jail or comparable institution
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_DEATHSPOUSETIME
variable.description: 3. Time Period for: Death of Spouse
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_SLEEPTIME
variable.description: 4. Time Period for: Major Change in Sleeping Habits
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_DEATHOFMOTHERTIME
variable.description: 5a. Time Period for: Death of Mother
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_DEATHOFFATHERTIME
variable.description: 5b. Time Period for: Death of Father
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_DEATHOFBROTHERTIME
variable.description: 5c. Time Period for: Death of Brother

variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.description: 5g. Time Period for: Death of Other Close Family
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_CHGEATINGTIME
variable.description: 6. Time Period for: Major change in eating habits
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_FORECLOSURETIME
variable.description: 7. Time Period for: Foreclosure on Mortgage or loan
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_DEATHCLOSEFRIENDTIME
variable.description: 8. Time Period for: Death of a close friend
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.description: 9. Time Period for: Outstanding personal achievement
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.description: 12. Time Period for: Pregnancy

variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.description: 14. Time Period for: New Job
variable.value: Both 0 to 6 months and 7 months to 1 year ago

variable.name: LES_NTE
variable.description: Life Experiences Survey: # of events experienced in last year

variable.name: LES_NNE
variable.description: Life Experiences Survey: # of negative Events

variable.name: LES_SNE
variable.description: Life Experiences Survey: sum of negative impacts

variable.name: LES_NPE
variable.description: Life Experiences Survey: # of positive impacts

variable.name: LES_SPE
variable.description: Life Experiences Survey: sum of positive impacts

variable.name: LES_TIC
variable.description: Life Experiences Survey: net impact (positive minus negative)
